Class LiCreateMessageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters.LiCreateMessageAdapter

  • public class LiCreateMessageAdapter
extends <any>
    This adapter extends RecyclerView.Adapter that can display a form using which user can post a question on reply to a message
